channel.description: Users Routes Now that we have written and tested the routes for the Role model, let’s start working on the routes for the User model. These routes will be much more complex, because we want the ability to add, update, and delete users in our database. To do this, we’ll create several RESTful routes, which pair HTTP verbs and paths to the various CRUD operations that can be performed on the database.
